Posts.Content: Hi Need some advise and hopefully some reasurrance , I found a small , hard lump under my right armpit it doesnt hurt . Aches a little . Noticed it 2 days ago. Im 44 . Believe im already on my change. Periods very irregular. Normally 28day cycle. Should I be concerned. ? 0 likes, 6 replies Report
Posts.Title: Small hard lump under armpit? Bit worried

Posts.Content: Hi Sue, probably nothing to worry about, maybe a cyst. Don't try an Internet diagnosis. Go to your GP. Report
Posts.Title: Small hard lump under armpit? Bit worried

Posts.Content: Hi ladies Thank you all. Such a great site. And I appreciate all ur replys and advise. Like a donut I still haven't been to see my doctor mainly because im hoping its just a swollen gland. Yesterday after talking to my daughter and her asking me to take some pics of my breast and forward them onto her . So took photos . Sat back down ready to look through pics and select one to send to my daughter (who has been a fantastic listener n support) And WOW I was so shocked. " how did I not notice this" maybe cause its happened suddenly my right breast has got alot bigger than the other.( normally both breast are pretty much the sameish size ) its massive, no visable lump, iv tried to feel for one but as im a 38dd my breast are always have been lumpy. So cant feel much. But I a sufferer of psoriasis . Have been for 6 ish years so wrn my right nipple started forming a crust it didnt worry me . . Im planning to phone doctors in morning for an appointment. But I doubt that eill happen cause im terrified. What s going on . Help pls? Report
Posts.Title: Small hard lump under armpit? Bit worried

Posts.Content: Thank you all for your advise. I still haven't plucked up the courage to go to the doctors. The lump is still there. Not got any bigger. It doesnt move and doesnt hurt. Could it still be a cyst or swollen glands Thank you again for all your advice Report
